references.text: In another Queen's Co. [now County Laois] family approaching death was heralded by the cry of the cuckoo, no matter at what season of the year it might occur. A Mrs. F-- and her son lived near Clonaslee. One day, in mid-winter, their servant heard a cuckoo; they went out for a drive, the trap jolted over a stone, throwing Mrs. F-- out, and breaking her neck.
